content: How about you join me this time?

content: {A疑惑}Take a break? Who? Me? Nah~ I'm good for, like, three hundred more dances! ...Wait, you need one? Oh, okay! Break time it is!

content: Dance? Totally! But, I mean, is Yunguo in her pajamas? So... {A惊讶}this is a pajama party?!

content: Oh, by the way... I've got a whole bunch of biker outfits! How about we throw a biker party next time?

content: {A伸懒腰}It's over already? Swoosh~! I loved dancing with all of you. We've gotta do it again sometime!

content: When it comes to dancing, I'm not the star of the show — my long ears are! Swoosh~!

content: What's all this? You're having a party? Well —{短暂停} no way I'd sit this out!
